The police and FBI launch a nationwide manhunt, but are thwarted at every turn by the killer's enigmatic, and unprecedented behaviour. Despite her lack of experience, Eleanor is drawn deeper into the case as she, and her newfound mentor, realise that she may be the only person, given her own tortured psyche, who can understand the mind of this singular killer. programme.title: Gunpowder Milkshake
programme.desc: In her turbulent life as a professional assassin, Scarlet was cruelly forced to abandon her daughter Sam and go on the run. Years later, despite the estrangement, Sam has also grown up into a cold-blooded hitwoman. After a high-stakes mission spins out of control, Sam has no choice but to go rogue. This ultimately leads her back to her mother and her former sidekicks, who join forces against those who took everything from them. Action thriller, starring Karen Gillan and Lena Headey Navot Papushado - Director Karen Gillan - Sam Lena Headey - Scarlet Carla Gugino - Madeleine Michelle Yeoh - Florence Angela Bassett - Anna May Chloe Coleman - Emily Paul Giamatti - Nathan.

programme.title: Days of Thunder

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.sub-title: Documentary And Factual, War, Drama, Action, History ║ 2001 ║ 15
programme.desc: War drama based on real events, starring Josh Hartnett, Ewan McGregor and Tom Sizemore. On 3 October 1993, elite US troops were sent into Somalia's capital, Mogadishu, to capture two lieutenants working for the local warlord responsible for orchestrating a famine in the region. programme.desc: Martin Scorsese's crime drama, starring Robert De Niro, Ray Liotta and Joe Pesci. In 1950s New York, Irish-Italian schoolboy Henry Hill dreams of becoming a gangster and lands a job parking cars for the Mob. programme.title: Hypnotic
programme.sub-title: Mystery, Thriller, Drama, Action, Sci Fi ║ 2023 ║ 15
programme.desc: Police detective Danny Rourke is haunted by the abduction of his seven-year-old daughter Minnie from a park. During a bank heist, Danny discovers a photo of his daughter with an instruction to find someone called Dell Rayne. Evidence leads to a psychic Diana Cruz, who introduces the cop to the unseen world of hypnotics - people with the ability to control how we perceive the world. programme.title: Ruby Gillman, Teenage Kraken
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Animation, Comedy, Children's, Family ║ 2023 ║ PG
programme.desc: Shy teenager Ruby Gillman is a kraken who lives on dry land in Oceanside with parents Arthur and Agatha and her younger brother Sam. programme.title: The Cinema List: Oscar Winners
programme.desc: Count down to the 96th Academy Awards as we count up from a film that has won one Oscar, to two, to three and all the way to eleven wins.

programme.title: Ferrari
programme.desc: During the summer of 1957, ex-racecar driver Enzo Ferrari is in crisis. Bankruptcy stalks the company he and his wife, Laura, built from nothing a decade earlier. Their tempestuous marriage struggles with the mourning for one son and the acknowledgement of another. Attempting to secure their survival, he rolls the dice on one race - 1,000 miles across Italy, the iconic Mille Miglia. programme.title: Ferrari
programme.desc: During the summer of 1957, ex-racecar driver Enzo Ferrari is in crisis. Bankruptcy stalks the company he and his wife, Laura, built from nothing a decade earlier. Their tempestuous marriage struggles with the mourning for one son and the acknowledgement of another. Attempting to secure their survival, he rolls the dice on one race - 1,000 miles across Italy, the iconic Mille Miglia. programme.title: Bahrain F1 Grand Prix 2018

programme.desc: The 2019 Bahrain Grand Prix from Sakhir. Ferrari's Charles Leclerc starts on pole after a stunning qualifying session, with teammate Sebastian Vettel second and Lewis Hamilton third.
